summary: A suicidal young woman gives her newborn child up to his deadbeat father in the Fontainhas slums of Lisbon.
cast: Vanda Duarte|Nuno Vaz|Mariya Lipkina|Isabel Ruth|Inês de Medeiros|Miguel Sermão|Berta Susana Teixeira|Clotilde Montron|Zita Duarte|Beatriz Lopez|Luísa Carvalho|Ana Marta|Carolina Eira|Ricky Tavares|Anna Carvalho
title: Ossos
